name: No More Mr. Dice Guy
description:
Made for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam. A game about rolling dice; characters move as if they were dice. Sometimes they fight, and the bigger number wins.

Mr. Dice Guy is stuck in a mobster's casino, and it'll take more than a lucky spin to roll through the enemies in his path.

HOW TO PLAY: Move around with the directional arrows/D-pad. The number on  your face changes as you roll around. If you step next to an enemy,  you fight, and the bigger number wins. Ties are decided by a coin toss.

Made with the Godot engine

This was coded entirely by myself, and current assets were contributed by friends who wanted to help with the art side of things. They did some great work!!
